login.title: Sign in with NFTwist
login.sub_title: Enter your E-mail Address and Password to log into your account.

signUp.desc1: Welcome to the fastest growing NFT platform. NFTwist is the easiest way to get started and dive freely into the world of NFTs.
signUp.desc2: We create for you a secure and unique wallet upon sign up, where you will receive and store your NFTs, and funds once you make successful sales on our marketplace.
signUp.desc3: We do not own your private keys and cannot access your funds without your confirmation.
signUp.Why_NFTwist_Ans1: We are starting a revolution in the world of NFTs
signUp.Why_NFTwist_Ans2: by allowing creation, buying, selling and transfers to be extremely easy and cheap!
signUp.What_is_our_membership_fee_Ans1: We charge 4.20 USD (approximately 15.75 AED) as a onetime fee upon sign up
signUp.What_is_our_membership_fee_Ans2: and you receive 2 twist credits to get started right away with your NFTs. Twist credits never expire!
signUp.Are_you_a_buyer_Ans: You can signup as a buyer and buy any NFT you like, to signup as a buyer is free. If you would like to create an NFT in the future, you can always purchase twist credits.

errors.m_password: Password and Confirm Password must be match.
errors.name: Please enter name

valid.newPass: Password must be 8 characters and alphanumeric.
